item.title: MicroCN-OpenSource-List
item.description:
å¾®æœåŠ¡æ²»ç†

  • Femas : Cloud native multi-runtime microservice framework

Showcase

PaaS

  • JPlag : Detecting Software Plagiarism

  • Nextcloud : â˜ï¸ Nextcloud server, a safe home for all your data

Database

  • 2021-Supabase : Supabase is an open source Firebase alternative. We’re building the features of Firebase using enterprise-grade open source tools.

Public APIs

  • Any API: Documentation and Test Consoles for Over 1400 Public APIs

  • NeteaseCloudMusicApi : ç½‘æ˜“äº‘éŸ³ä¹ NodeJS ç‰ˆ API

  • InstaReProxy : This builds over the Instagram’s public API to provide more functionality and provides a CORS complaint reverse instagram proxy service.

  • Public JSON APIs: A collective list of public JSON APIs for use in web development. ä¿¡æ¯æ£€ç´¢ã€æœºå™¨å­¦ä¹ ã€åœ¨çº¿ã€‚

  • Public-APIs: This is an attempt to categorise different APIs scoured from the web which make their resources available for consumption.

Awesome Devs

  • now.sh

  • CaptainDuckDuck : Easiest app/database deployment platform and webserver package for your NodeJS, Python, Java applications. No Docker, nginx knowledge required!

  • Coolify : An open-source, hassle-free, self-hostable Heroku & Netlify alternative

  • URL to PDF Microservice : Web page PDF rendering done right. Self-hosted service for rendering receipts, invoices, or any content.

  • wallabag : wallabag is a self hostable application for saving web pages: Save and classify articles. Read them later. Freely.

  • jsonstore : jsonstore.io offers a free, secured and JSON based cloud datastore for small projects.

  • Reverse engineering WhatsApp Web. : This project intends to provide a complete description and re-implementation of the WhatsApp Web API, which will eventually lead to a custom client. WhatsApp Web internally works using WebSockets; this project does as well.

  • 2019-Firefly III : â€œFirefly IIIâ€ is a financial manager. It can help you keep track of expenses, income, budgets and everything in between. It even supports credit cards, shared household accounts and savings accounts! Itâ€™s pretty fancy. You should use it to save and organise money.

  • 2020-Calendso : The open-source Calendly alternative.

  • 2021-notifire : ğŸš€ Open-source notification infrastructure for products
